column4: Hi everyone. I am very new to Linux and Ubuntu. After installing Ubuntu on my IBM T30 laptop everything worked fine. Yet after updating Ubuntu (the kernel was updated from 2.6.17-10 to 2.6.17-11) my wireless card does not work. When booting with the old kernel it works fine, but nut with the kernel version 2.6.17-11. Please can anyone help me?
Hi Experts! :-) Can anyone help me to get my wireless card to work with kernel 2.6.17-11? Please help...
ok, but i did not need to install any drivers
I have found some commands on the forum, that makes the card work under kernel 11 - but after every reboot I need to enter the same commands. Can I make a bat-file?
Shat rat - thanks for trying to help me
what commands do you have to rerun?
the last command looks redudant... it requires all 4?
whats the name of the device? eth1? eth0?
you dont want to be editing your init scripts...
- thanks, I will wait. BTW how do I determine if it eth1 or 0?
what are you using to configure your network card?
you enter those 3 lines i said
- do you mean the lines I am using to get the network card to work?
but yes thats the jist of it...
